articles.title: Austin Butler, Tom Hanks and Baz Luhrmann on How Superheroes Inspired Elvis - IGN
articles.description: The director and stars of Elvis elaborate on the late rock star's love of comic books and how Captain Marvel Jr. inspired his distinctive look. Elvis opens on June 24.
